WorkItem.Description:
(Revision 33964)
 
Sigil of the Unfaltering Knight (item ID 40714) is currently imported as providing a flat 53 defense rating.
 
The text for the special effect states: "Your Icy Touch will also increase your defense rating by 53."  This effect is shown on Wowhead as proc'ing a buff called "Unflinching Valor" when Icy Touch is cast.  This buff increases defense rating by 53 for 30 seconds.
 
As a result, the Sigil should be imported as providing no static buffs and instead having a SpecialEffect of increasing defense rating by 53 on Trigger.IcyTouchHit with a duration of 30s.
 
This is admittedly only relevant if one assumes that a Frost DK tank with the Howling Blast glyph may not use IT for placing Frost Fever on the target every 30s since HB would already do this.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Sigil of the Unfaltering Knight import appears incorrect

Comments.Message: Yeah, that was me just trying to get stats in there to work, and most people I've talked to count it as a straight 53 Def.  But I agree w/ the new Triggers that you've provided, I should update this as well.  Adding to my list.
So with this change how can I "activate" it? I don't see any place to set up rotation to include keeping IT up and all my upgrades are screwed cause the Def items are rated higher.

I had it as a general always on effect.  But it was changed to a special effect, however, there are not any shot rotation options in the Tank module just yet.  So I'm working on that.  I'll add a new task to get shot rotations enabled.

So for now, it doesn't work again. :(
